reference.title: Accessibility
reference.shortdesc: Accessibility features help users who have a physical disability, such as restricted mobility or limited vision, to use information technology products successfully.

section.title: Moving around the screen elements by using the keyboard
section.p: To move around the elements on the screen, press Tab.

When a menu tab has focus, a box is displayed around the text for that menu tab. You can then move between the menus Home, Messaging, Monitoring, and Appliance, by using the arrow keys. To go to the options that are available from the menu that is in focus, press Shift+F10. Use the space bar to select an item from the list.

To access check boxes located within a grid, press Tab to move focus to the grid. Then, use the arrow keys to move to the check box you want to select. Press F2 to focus on the check box, and press Spacebar to select or clear the check box. To move focus away from the check box, press Tab.
